name: OMG SUN EXPLODED AND WE ARE GOING TO DIE
name_original: OMG SUN EXPLODED AND WE ARE GOING TO DIE
description:
2020 couldn't get any worse right? WRONG! On the first day of december, sun just casually exploded, you and your crew were late on evacuation, the only rocket left has a broken engine, which is out of your control, will you manage to escape and get to the shelter?

This game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2020

theme for which was "Out of control"

Controlls:

Rotate: A/D | Left/Arrow keys

Restart: R


Music used in game:

February by Vibe Mountain

Viceless by Hamezii

My Youtube Channel My Discord Server
